title: AI Will Only Intensify Climate Change. The Tech Moguls Don’t Care.
description:
Juan Cole



The AI phenomenon may functionally print money for tech billionaires, at least for the time being, but it comes with a gargantuan environmental cost.




The post AI Will Only Intensify Climate Change. The Tech Moguls Don’t Care. appeared first…
